column3: ...Hm? I can't very well dispose of something you don't have, now, can I?

...Really? Well, I suppose the moldy old book <hex:021A020203>was<hex:021A020103> bound for the furnace any─errr...I mean, it breaks my heart to see a piece of history treated like so many pages of soiled parchment, but who am I to argue with a customer?
All progress within <hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:03E802020203> will be lost. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
There. It's done. That particular bit of history will never bother you again. I hope you're happy now.
You throw away a book from the Trials of the Braves.
